ygData.subject: Re:  The latest patch
ygData.msgSnippet: Well they basically destroyed the Box of Abu Kar. making it only 20% weight reduction instead of the 100% before. ... From: Scott Hueseman
ygData.messageBody:
Well they basically destroyed the Box of Abu Kar.

making it only 20% weight reduction instead of the 100% before.
----- Original Message -----
From: Scott Hueseman <shueseman@...>
To: <EQ-Monks@onelist.com>
Sent: Tuesday, September 14, 1999 12:24 PM
Subject: [EQ-Monks] The latest patch


> From: "Scott Hueseman" <shueseman@...>
>
> Kinda quiet today, so I thought I'd stir some it up:
>
> Are there any new things in the patch that help/hurt monks? Lot's of
spell
> changes went in, warriors got a new set of weapons, and there are some new
> undiscovered quests out there.
>
> What affects us? I haven't been able to play yet, so I don't know.
>
> Dornn
>
